thread.title: Six more weeks of winter, the Groundhog Day forecast

title: Six more weeks of winter, the Groundhog Day forecast
text:
Six more weeks of winter, the Groundhog Day forecast 2:58pm EST - 00:58 
Punxsutawney Phil, the American groundhog famous for his weather predictions, emerged from his burrow atop Gobbler's Knob in Pennsylvania on Friday and saw his shadow, forecasting six more weeks of winter. Rough Cut   
Punxsutawney Phil, the American groundhog famous for his weather predictions, emerged from his burrow atop Gobbler's Knob in Pennsylvania on Friday and saw his shadow, forecasting six more weeks of winter. Rough Cut  //reut.rs/2DWbi53
